Articles.Content: Grrr Just release it already xDD

that I have hear, sounds great, but I am also a bit pissed, as all the hard work I have gone into the game in building my bases, going off to other plants, minings is go to ****, as the new version will trash it.

why can't they just allow backward compatible for anythign that is in flight, and anything new has to be to the new version.

that I have hear, sounds great, but I am also a bit pissed, as all the hard work I have gone into the game in building my bases, going off to other plants, minings is go to ****, as the new version will trash it.

why can't they just allow backward compatible for anythign that is in flight, and anything new has to be to the new version.

Sometimes this is not possible, chris. The changes to the new version of the game essentially disallow the continuing of any saves. The devs did not do this on purpose, this is the price of progress.

I too can't wait for the career mode.

I started making a tycoon based mod that would actually reward you for missions [Ex. $5,000 for landing on the Mun, $25,000 for exploring the Mun's surface] and it would track the cost of the parts... But, with work / my game i'm working on, this was put on the back burner.

that I have hear, sounds great, but I am also a bit pissed, as all the hard work I have gone into the game in building my bases, going off to other plants, minings is go to ****, as the new version will trash it.

why can't they just allow backward compatible for anythign that is in flight, and anything new has to be to the new version.

Remember that we are all playing the game before it's official release so if they want to add something that breaks saves they will. In the official released version this probably would never happen.

I'm pretty eh about Career mode and kerbalnaut center. ME WANT things to do on the planets and moons and more parts.

But I'll probably play the hell out of the game anyway.

Here are VAB and SPH images with the finalized shaders

SPH- http://i.imgur.com/gg0THo4.jpg

VAB- http://i.imgur.com/9th0meP.jpg
So we can drive a rover inside the VAB or SPH while ingame, and "interact" with all those roaming Kerbals? or will they disapear when driving a vehicle?

So we can drive a rover inside the VAB or SPH while ingame, and "interact" with all those roaming Kerbals? or will they disapear when driving a vehicle?

Not sure about that... it would be neat though!

So we can drive a rover inside the VAB or SPH while ingame, and "interact" with all those roaming Kerbals? or will they disapear when driving a vehicle?

The doors will probably shut like they do in all the previous versions.

A message to Squad:

If .21 is not released today (16th) I will declare a Jihad upon my Kerban Space Stations. Kerbals WILL DIE! You have 23 hours remaining. Good day.

Stizzy

There is no release yet!
Pintles and gudgeons! Pintles and gudgeons! The one thing I want most with my 0.21 is pintles and gudgeons!
They said that there's going to be a "special event" on the KSP-TV marathon tomorrow. Suspicious, no?
Before 0.18 was released, the media group got the experimentals a few days (about three) before the official release. I hope this is the case again.

Before 0.18 was released, the media group got the experimentals a few days (about three) before the official release. I hope this is the case again.

thats what I was thinking as well. I counted 3 days, so maybe on sunday? other wise i dont want to keep making predications because it makes the wait worse

but i am excited for 0.21
They never release on weekends, so my bet is next week. Can't wait to crash into buzz the tower!

They never release on weekends, so my bet is next week. Can't wait to crash into buzz the tower!

0.14 and 0.19 was released on a Saturday.

well you can actually fly properly now with the new ASAS logic in the update
Omfg that ASAS video...I want it...I want it now!!!
It would have been nice if someone had made a video of Moho/Eve, only Chickenkeeper seemed to remember to even mention it.

0.14 and 0.19 was released on a Saturday.

And 0.18 was released late on a friday night if I remember correctly

And 0.18 was released late on a friday night if I remember correctly

Yup, because I checked in the morning and at around 1300 to see if it had come out, and it hadn't. Then when I got back on the forums in the evening it was out.
It will probably release very soon, I guess in two or three days, since they released it to some youtubers.
I wonder if the terrain scatter is changed on the inner planets as well as the heightmaps.
